feature1.explanation: Both texts use commas effectively to separate clauses and phrases within sentences.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar level of lexical variation and word choice, with informal language and common expressions.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures in both texts are relatively simple with a mix of longer and shorter sentences, contributing to coherence.

feature4.explanation: Both texts share a casual tone and mood in the writing, with an informal conversational style.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were found in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
